text: VisualEditor (VE) is a project developed by the Wikimedia Foundation together with Wikia. It is similar to a WYSIWYG editor, and is available as a MediaWiki extension. The Beta version of this extension was enabled on Mediawiki.org and other larger Wikipedia in July 2013 by default, but users could decide to opt- out. == References == ==Other websites== * MediaWiki VisualEditor * MediaWiki Extension: VisualEditor * Help:VisualEditor - Community Central * What you see is Wiki - Questioning WYSIWYG in the Internet Age * MediaWiki alternative parsers * Building a Visual Editor for Wikipedia Category:Free software Category:Wikimedia Category:JavaScript
title: VisualEditor
